columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the member.
columns.Nationality: The country of origin for the member.
columns.Age: The current age of the member.

member.table_description: The table stores information about club members.

columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club in the database.
columns.Overall_Ranking: The ranking of the club based on specified criteria.
columns.Team_Leader: The name of the leader for the club.
columns.Club_Name: The official name of the club.

club.table_description: The table stores details about various clubs and their rankings.

columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club a leader belongs to.
columns.Member_ID: The unique identifier for each member serving as a leader.
columns.Year_Join: The year when the member joined the club.

club_leader.table_description: The table tracks club leaders and their membership details.
